channel.title: Amanda Goen on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Amanda Goen on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2013-{year} David E. Williams. All rights reserved.

item.title: Status Update – July 29, 2019
item.description: Daycare, Lesa PTO, split time between Bloomington/Bedford. Chickens survived past 24 hrs. Barely time for supper. Lesa took Ashley to Amanda’s, went to Skateland with Girl Scouts, late when I picked her up. I took boys to swim lessons, Dillan stayed home with Lesa, Dillan a pill.

item.title: Status Update – May 13, 2019
item.description: Wanted to sleep in, didn’t happen. Long work day. Amanda Goen picked up Ashley from daycare, took her to Girl Scout Bridge Ceremony. Lesa picked up boys, took them home. I picked up Ashley after her event. Lesa took boys to Scouts, last meeting for season. Ashley practiced piano.

item.title: Status Update – May 2, 2019
item.description: Lesa wants to make offer on house, I don’t, so we won’t. Bruce took field trip to quarry, he had fun. All baseball practices rained out. Scouts canceled, Amanda in hospital, pregnancy complications, Alisha Goodwine took over, Scouts after all, Lesa took her and boys, boys played.

item.title: Status Update – April 13, 2019
item.description: Drafted floor plan until 4:30a, tired. Amanda drove Ashley to Greenfield for WOW Adventure, she had fun, I didn’t have to chaperone. Took Dillan to first ball practice of season, Lesa took Dwyane and Bruce to theirs. Went to Walmart, Jiffy Treat, Fayetteville Baptist Bean Supper.

item.title: Status Update – April 4, 2019
item.description: Work never-ending, Signed tax returns with H&R Block, getting $14,191 refund! Kids had Safe Touch thing at school. Scouts cancel, Amanda fell down stairs, having baby checked out. Went to Buffalo Wild Wings for dinner, four adult meals, hefty bill. Walmart for recycle containers.

item.title: Status Update – March 21, 2019
item.description: Kids rode bus. Worked in Bloomington until noon, then SAIC, repeating tomorrow. Ashley packed lunch. Picked kids up, dropped Ashley at Amanda’s, Brownies went to Build A Bear, built Brownie bears, she had fun. Lesa handled kids AND homework, I crashed on couch. I’m catching cold?

item.title: Status Update – March 6, 2019
item.description: Cold, sub-zero wind chills, kids stayed in truck until bus. Day dragged by. Lesa picked up Ashley, took her to Amanda’s, Scout trip, Space Lab in Bloomington. I picked up boys, was watching TV, didn’t notice Lesa picked up Ashley! Quiet evening. Took Dillan with me to get Ashley.

item.title: Status Update – February 24, 2019
item.description: Church, lead in back, Lesa stayed home. Ashley had World Day at Scouts, manipulated Amanda into buying her chicken nuggets. Bruce peed/pooped his pants, peed them yesterday and his bed Friday, not sure what’s going on with him. Kids played outside. Played Yahtzee with Ashley. TV.

item.title: Status Update – February 16, 2019
item.description: Slept in, Dillan made me breakfast. Everyone, even Lesa, climbed into bed with me and got silly. Dillan has sore throat, feels sick. Low 30s, kids went out for short time. Took Ashley to Walmart, sold ton of cookies, we froze. Dwyane scared by Hookman story I told earlier in day.

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2019
item.description: Slept until 8! Helped Dillan do homework. Ashley piano. Took her to IGA to sell cookies, CVS for Dwyane and Lesa’s scripts, Wendy’s. Lesa took boys, dogs for walk to mailbox. Kids played inside/outside, Dillan went to Gabe’s, rest played with slime, bugged me about Wii, Monopoly.

item.title: Status Update – January 24, 2019
item.description: Normal school start, kids rode bus. Ashley looks, feels, better. Day dragged on, left ½ hour early. Ashley turned in GS Cookie order forms, girls made sandwiches for homeless shelter. Marriage Oneness class, Amanda babysat again. Cold, sub-zero wind chills, 2-hour delay tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – January 10, 2019
item.description: Boys messed around, not ready, missed bus, took them to school. Tired all day. Got kids, rushed dinner. Dropped Ashley at Fayetteville Elementary for Scouts. Cincinnati Christian for Oneness Marriage Class. Nancy Clensy watched boys. Picked up Ashley at Amanda Goen’s after class.
